titles.title: O God Our Help In Ages Past

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O God, our Help in ages past, newline Our Hope for years to come, newline Our Shelter from the stormy blast, newline And our eternal Home!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Under the shadow of Thy throne newline Still may we dwell secure; newline Sufficient is Thine arm alone, newline And our defense is sure.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Before the hills in order stood, newline Or earth received her frame, newline From everlasting Thou art God, newline To endless years the same.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: O God, our Help in ages past, newline Our Hope for years to come, newline Be Thou my Guide while life shall last, newline And our eternal Home.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: A thousand ages in Thy sight, newline Are like and evening gone; newline Short as the watch that ends the night, newline Before the rising sun.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Time like an ever rolling stream, newline Bears all its sons away; newline They fly, forgotten, as a dream newline Die at the op'ning day.
